name: wizgallery
info: a full-stack web gallery app that displays images from a local database.
description: has a simple search feature that allows you to search for images through a form. the app also has a feature that allows you to view all images from the database.
technologies: built using Flask, Next.js, MySQL, TailwindCSS, Docker

name: nectar
info: a full-stack web app that compares prices between user inputted products from several e-commerce websites.
description: has a form that allows users to input a given product, and scrapes Amazon to retrieve similar products around that price range and provides statistical models. Won best E-Commerce Theme and Best Use of GitHub for NewHacks2023.
technologies: built using Flask, BeautifulSoup4, Next.js, and TailwindCSS

name: quizzard
info: a quiz app that tests users on Web Systems Development. Made for CPS530
description: it touches the basics of web development and tests the users knowledge through a flashcard based quiz!
technologies: built using Vue.js and deployed on github pages

name: coinwatch
info: a W.I.P web application that provides current data on the crypto market, prices, exchanges, and daily news.
description: it uses the CryptoCompare API to retrieve data and display it on the web app. it also has a feature that allows users to search for a specific cryptocurrency and view its data.
